00045 // 64 bit signed variable.

00065 // define the wchar_t type if not already built in.
00066 #ifdef _MSC_VER 
00067 #ifndef _WCHAR_T_DEFINED
00069 
00076 typedef unsigned short wchar_t;
00077 #define _WCHAR_T_DEFINED
00078 #endif // wchar is not defined
00079 #endif // microsoft compiler
